page.title: 07STREET GAMES IN WORSBROUGH
page.content: {PEGS:}To play pegs you need two teams each with the same number of people. You lean three pegs against a wall with another peg across the top of the other three. The captains of both of the teams try to knock the pegs down with the tennis ball. The first captain to do this, his team goes first. They take it in turns to throw the ball at the pegs and if they knock the pegs down and the fielding team catch the ball without it bouncing on the floor, the team who were throwing are out. If they knock all the pegs down they have to try and put the pegs back up again as quick as they can. If the fielding team gets the ball and throws it at the person who is putting the pegs up and it hits them the throwing team is out. When the throwing team is out the fielding team have their turn to throw.
